title: Understanding Cultural Self-Awareness
text: Cultural self-awareness involves recognizing how your own cultural background influences your thoughts, behaviors, and interactions with others.

title: Impact of Culture on Self
text: Consider how your cultural norms, values, and beliefs shape your identity and how you perceive the world.

hintAnswer: a person’s understanding of their own culture and its impact on themselves
title: Defining Cultural Self-Awareness
text: What does it mean to be aware of your own culture?
choices: a person’s understanding of their own culture and its impact on themselves
when everyone has a fair opportunity to obtain optimal health
imposition of one’s own values, beliefs, and practices upon another person or group
the client is offered a choice to withdraw from a stressful situation and go to another location
